channel.title: Simple User Input Class

item.title: Simple User Input Class
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

import java.util.*;

public class UserInput
{
public static void main(String[] args)
{
int intInput;
String stringInput;

	Scanner input = new Scanner(System.in);

	System.out.print("What Do You Think To Radeon? ");
	stringInput = input.nextLine();

	System.out.print("Why Do You Think This? ");
	intInput = input.nextInt();

	input.close();

	System.out.print("You Think Radeon is " + stringInput + " Because " + intInput + " \n Now Isnt That Clever!!\n\n");

}

}
